com.qualcomm.hardware

Class ReadWriteRunnableStandard

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qualcomm.hardware.ReadWriteRunnableStandard
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReadWriteRunnableBlocking

    public class ReadWriteRunnableStandard
extends java.lang.Object
    Main loop that copies the read/write buffer from/to the device

    Helper class for Modern Robotics USB Device

      • ReadWriteRunnableStandard

        public ReadWriteRunnableStandard(SerialNumber serialNumber,
                                 RobotUsbDevice device,
                                 int monitorLength,
                                 int startAddress,
                                 boolean debug)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        serialNumber - USB serial number
        device - FTDI device
        monitorLength - length of memory map to continually monitor
        startAddress - starting address of changing buffer values.
